name: aifinadvisor-api-libs
description: API libraries generator and publisher for FinApp

scripts.validate: npm run lint:openapi && openapi-generator-cli validate -i openapi.yaml
scripts.generate:backend: openapi-generator-cli generate -g spring -i openapi.yaml -o ./generated/backend --package-name com.finapp.api --api-package com.finapp.api.controller --model-package com.finapp.api.model --additional-properties=useSpringBoot3=true,interfaceOnly=true,skipDefaultInterface=true,groupId=com.finapp,artifactId=finapp-api-client
scripts.generate:all: npm run validate && npm run generate:backend && npm run generate:frontend
scripts.prepare:packages: npm run generate:all && npm run copy:packages
scripts.copy:packages: npm run copy:backend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:backend: rimraf packages/backend-api/src && cp -r generated/backend/src packages/backend-api/ && cp generated/backend/pom.xml packages/backend-api/ && node scripts/fix-backend-pom.js
scripts.copy:frontend: rimraf packages/frontend-api/src && mkdir -p packages/frontend-api/src && cp -rv generated/frontend/src/* packages/frontend-api/src/ && cp -rv generated/frontend/package.json packages/frontend-api/ && cp -rv generated/frontend/tsconfig* packages/frontend-api/ && echo 'Frontend files copied successfully'
scripts.build:packages: npm run prepare:packages && npm run build:frontend-package
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run update:package-versions
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run update:package-versions
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run update:package-versions
scripts.publish:all: npm run build:packages && npm run publish:frontend && npm run publish:backend

author: sergey-vsv
